text: The following is a list of regional Twenty20 cricket leagues in India, sorted alphabetically. == Current leagues == {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! scope="col" rowspan="2" |League ! scope="col" rowspan="2" |State ! scope="col" rowspan="2" |Administrator ! scope="col" rowspan="2" |No. of teams† ! scope="col" rowspan="2" |No. of venues† ! scope="col" colspan="3" |Seasons ! scope="col" rowspan="2" |Total prize pool ! scope="col" rowspan="2" |Notes ! scope="col" rowspan="2" |Ref(s) |- !scope="col" |First !scope="col" |Most recent !scope="col" |Total |- |Karnataka Premier League |Karnataka |KSCA |7 |2 |2009/10 |2019/20 |8 | |Oldest regional T20 league | |- |Odisha Premier League |Odisha |OCA |8 | |2011 |2020 |4 | |Resumed in 2020 after a seven-year hiatus | |- |Saurashtra Premier League |Gujarat |SCA |5 |1 |2019 |2019 |1 | | | |- |T20 Mumbai League |Maharashtra |MCA |8 |1 |2018 |2019 |2 | | | |- |Tamil Nadu Premier League |Tamil Nadu |TNCA |8 |3 |2016 |2019 |4 | | | |} † \- during the most recent season == Defunct leagues == {| class="wikitable sortable" !League !State !Years !Notes |- |Maharashtra Premier League |Maharashtra |2009 | |- |Rajputana Premier League | rowspan="2" |Rajasthan |2016 |Suspended during the first season due to match fixing allegations |- |Rajwada Cricket League |2017 | |- |Telangana T20 Premier League |Telangana |2018 | |} == See also == * List of cricket competitions * Celebrity Cricket League – Non-professional T20 league played among film actors == References == Category:Cricket leagues in India Category:Twenty20 cricket leagues Category:Indian cricket lists Domestic
title: List of regional T20 cricket leagues in India
